pullrequest.title: Remove use of catkin-tools in ARIAC tutorial

content.raw:
thank you for fixing that @_jrivero_ 

It seems that I haven't actually removed the use of catkin-tools at [line 36](#!/osrf/release-tools/src/144b4da4b5bdeadda261a07ed24a60960ea2aef9/jenkins-scripts/docker/ariac-install-test-job.bash?fileviewer=file-view-default#ariac-install-test-job.bash-36) so I mustn't have committed everything to this branch. I'll fix it.
